name: BLADES (Beanfox)
description:
----------------------------------------------

Dodge and weave between an ever-growing amount of saws, and try to beat your high score! Armed with just your movement you must try to survive as long as possible in this growing sea of saws. 

Three separate levels getting harder each time, medals to collect and high scores to beat! Good luck!

----------------------------------------------

Controls Are SUPER Simple! 

WASD - to move 

Mouse - to navigate the menu

----------------------------------------------

Tips and Tricks:

If you can try to stick to one spot and dodge the saws that come towards you. Sticking to one spot will lower the chances of you getting caught off guard!

Each level spawns more saws every 10 seconds. If your having trouble keeping up with the later levels, its okay to move back to level 1 and practice

----------------------------------------------

BLADES is the second game I have ever created. The tile set assets are thanks to https://opengameart.org/content/32x32-dungeon-tileset.

----------------------------------------------
